Sentencas: The primary aim of this work was to establish the mechanism of the oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) at (La0.8Sr0.2)(0.98)MnO3 (LSM)-based cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Mechanistic analysis of the oxygen reduction reaction at (La, Sr)MnO3 cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Rate equations, based on the Butler-Volmer equation and employing either Langmuir or Temkin adsorption conditions for reactant and intermediate species, were derived, yielding predicted reaction orders and transfer coefficients.
Titulo: Mechanistic analysis of the oxygen reduction reaction at (La, Sr)MnO3 cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Experimental data were collected using half-cell cyclic voltammetry in a variable pO(2) atmosphere (0.03 to 1 atm) at 600 to 900 degrees C, using both dense and porous LSM-based cathodes, employed to establish the impact of the accessibility of the active site on cathode activity.
Titulo: Mechanistic analysis of the oxygen reduction reaction at (La, Sr)MnO3 cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The rate of the ORR at dense LSM has been found to be limited by the dissociation of O-2ads(-) at low currents and by the first electron-transfer step, reducing O-2ads to O-2ads(-), at high currents.
Titulo: Mechanistic analysis of the oxygen reduction reaction at (La, Sr)MnO3 cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, at porous LSM cathodes, the reaction mechanism is more difficult to deduce because the electrode morphology impacts significantly on the measured kinetic and mechanistic parameters, giving anomalous transfer coefficients of <0.5.
Titulo: Mechanistic analysis of the oxygen reduction reaction at (La, Sr)MnO3 cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells
